website_summaries.verdict: This is an inexpensive reflective dog jacket that is very bright in dark settings. Best for larger dogs.
pros: Customers praise the smooth top zipper and high visibility of this jacket
While the fabric is not the most durable, it's a great deal for the price and is very lightweight, making it a good option for jogs or hikes in the summer
Very easy to put on your dog
cons: Seams may begin to separate after a few months of use

customer_reviews.title: Not accurate
customer_reviews.text: I was So excited for this for my little dog. We live in the country and it’s so hard to see him outside when he’s with us lol. The XS size is not accurate and won’t fit my boy. It’s way too big 😭 my yorkie is 6 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Morgan Hall

customer_reviews.title: It slows down passing cars
customer_reviews.text: This vest is exactly as i hoped to expect. It was the right size (large) and fit for my 65 lbs labrador “Bella”. She has plenty of room in her shoulders to freely move, run, yet the fit is snug enough to prevent her from trying to chew it off. The zipper feature is super easy, high quality, and stays zipped up during her activity which includes jumping through bushes trying flush rabbits to chase. In my photos you see i have a illuminated collar which perfectly compliments the vest. I will be purchasing the same one when the time comes for replacement.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t work out
customer_reviews.text: We had bought this because My gal loves to wait for the bus to come and drop off my son after school. We got it so she can be seen from afar with no issues. It’s Nice and bright! However, if you have a dog with a wide chest this will fit tight in that area and cause the zipper to zip down! It has no stretch, which I didn’t think it was going to. I gave this 4 starts because it is as advertised. My dog has a wide chest and this didn’t work for her but it is a good product. If we upsized it was going to be too long.
customer_reviews.author: Maria R.

customer_reviews.title: Runs WAAAAY too large!
customer_reviews.text: When they say size small, they really mean at least a medium. My dog weighs 11 pounds. Return postage is too expensive so I'll try to take it in using my sewing machine. I couldn't find their size chart although it was mentioned in the description. Pretty color, though!
customer_reviews.author: Rita P.

customer_reviews.title: Security and Safety for my Best Buddy
customer_reviews.text: I love this product; we have a large dog (Doberman) who is playful and loves to run in our woods here on Petit Jean Mountain. Being black, it is easy for him to disappear into the thickets and there is also a minor highway within a mile of our place. Until we put the Spot Trot on him we worried every minute he was gone.....always would come back, but the few times it took him a while we never could see him in the thickets. This product, with the top zipper, is great....easy to put on and Scout even looks forward to us putting it on him in the morning before he goes outside.
customer_reviews.author: Dr. P. Clay Sherrod

customer_reviews.title: Great concept bad design
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for my two English mastiffs. The concept of a walking vest for dogs is great especially sense we walk a lot at night. The problem is it shouldn't be a zipper its truly difficult to put this on properly with a large dog. I would recommend doing a Velcro strap across the chest. Also please note that this item doesn't hold up in the rain. This is after two months of use every single day. Thanks, Jake M.
customer_reviews.author: Jake Mabry

customer_reviews.title: Sizing not quite accurate but ok
customer_reviews.text: This vest is super lightweight and very bright. Reflective tape adds to visibility for my black dog on walks at dusk. That said, sizing was off. Based on measurements and lbs I ordered a large, which is tight and somewhat tricky to zip (and she does not have fluffy fur, so it3not her coat that causes the problem). Still worth keeping. Just a little bit of a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: EsperanzaSN

customer_reviews.title: Cheap quality, but can make it work
customer_reviews.text: It's pretty cheap. In the not-quite-6-weeks I've had it, with maybe 3-4 days a week usage, it's having some quality issues. First, some stitching came loose. Fortunately, the fabric wasn't torn, so it could be mended. Then one single tooth on the zipper fell off causing the zipper to catch. My Aussie-mix's coat already requires a bit of management not to get caught up, so this isn't helpful. However, I'm thinking of just adding a couple of velcro strips to solve that problem. I like the vest though, it fits well and looks good. Plus, it matches my own which is always good for a chuckle.
customer_reviews.author: trepmal

customer_reviews.title: Very visible.
customer_reviews.text: Fits like a glove on my 2 1/2 yr old heeler who runs with me while I bike. Very visible. Only suggestion I have is to put a stretch gusset on both sides that connects to the leg openings. It would allow it to flex/stretch with the dog during strenuous activity.
customer_reviews.author: Angie Mezeske

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for the money
customer_reviews.text: Great vests, I specifically ordered these because I wanted a fabric that Tick repellant spray would bond to. My Labrador cross has a LARGE size and my Collie cross has XLARGE, although both dogs weight around 60lbs the Collie has a much deeper chest. The way they zip on is great too, no fighting to bend legs and feet into leg holes! I hike with my hounds every day - through streams, mud, bracken and these vests have held up really well, I am ordering new ones now, and at this brilliant price it's great to get new ones without breaking the bank.
customer_reviews.author: shelleymab

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I bought one, it was the perfect cut, great material, nice stretch, loved it, but snug. A few months later bought the next size up, and it was nothing like the first, a cheap copy, crap material, awful cut, no stretch, a joke. I bought them both from the same seller, so it's not me, it's them.
customer_reviews.author: court

customer_reviews.title: Not ideal for deep-chested dogs.
customer_reviews.text: This High Visibility Reflective Dog Safety Vest is well made and I liked the zip up design however, it did not fit my deep-chested Rhodesian Ridgebacks. The fit was was loose around the shoulders and tight around the chest. So if you have a deep-chested dog, you might want to look for a High Visibility Reflective Dog Safety Vest that is not tight around the chest.
customer_reviews.author: Debit or Credit

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: Priced right, good quality for the price and easy to use with a nice zipper up the back instead of Velcro. My black lab weighs about 74 lbs and I purchased one for a dog that size: it fits but is a bit snug, so either my dog needs to lose a few lbs or I have to buy next size bigger
customer_reviews.author: jerry k

customer_reviews.title: Great High Quality Product
customer_reviews.text: It's a good reflective vest with large reflective panels. The zipper is good quality and is secure. There is a trade off concerning the zipper. There isn't a way to adjust it for an individual dog. It fits or it doesn't. That being said it fits my dog nicely.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Purvis

customer_reviews.title: Reflective, bright, lightweight
customer_reviews.text: I got an extra large for my 6 month old lab/German shepherd mix. As of right now it is big but I wanted her to be able to grow into it! It's reflective and lightweight which will be perfect for desert hikes and it'll be perfect for night walks! I wanted to get her something bright and reflective so people could see her at night, it is also lightweight for the heat! I don't think it runs large at all
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Clements

customer_reviews.title: SUPER bright
customer_reviews.text: I got this for camping trips with my 50 lb. pit bull, and it's great. Any flashlight or headlight that hits it, he lights up like a disco ball. The hi-viz yellow is good to keep him safe from anyone who might mistake him for a coyote or something, too. It's nice and roomy, so he can wear a little sweater underneath it on chilly nights.
customer_reviews.author: Here in NoPo

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the hiking or outdoor dog
customer_reviews.text: It fits a bit more snug that what I measured for by the sizing chart but it fits and was right size. That’s the only reason for the 4 stars vs 5 is the snugness. After that the shirt is amazing for a hiking or hunting dog holes are big enough for easy run and activity and you don’t have to worry about it falling off with it being zipped up. Lightweight and feels like a dry wick tshirt so great material. My dog has already gone through the mud and swimming with it and it was easy to clean. May pickup larger size to test it but definitely recommend it if your dog is going outside especially off leash
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't use for hunting dogs
customer_reviews.text: I ordered for a little visibility protection for our hunting labs but they got tore up 1st day of use. They are probably fine for just being seen on a walk.
customer_reviews.author: Roving Blue, Inc.

customer_reviews.title: Very visible vest
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit almost too small around my dogs chest. Easy to put on like the sturdy zipper. Bright yellow and love the big reflective patches on each side makes my pup very visible on are early morning walks. However, some of the seams are coming undone. the stomach part gets wet and dirty I have washed it numerous times even in baking soda but still has a very strong smell
customer_reviews.author: LM

customer_reviews.title: Functional EXCEPT...
customer_reviews.text: I really like this a lot except for the fact that the tab of the zipper broke the first time I zipped it onto my dog. Not good! I can zip it without the tab, but it doesn't stay zipped so I need to use a safety pin. So bummer - otherwise it's great - fits well and keeps my dog seen when we're out on hikes during hunting season.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I have an odd dog
customer_reviews.text: Nothing fits him. Either his chest is too big, or his "waist" is too small, or he's too long, or too short, or too tall. This was no exception. It fits his chest, but he pees inside it. Is there anything along these lines that's actually made for a male dog? So far I haven't found it. It seems well put together though.
customer_reviews.author: NLS

customer_reviews.title: Great reflective awareness, zips on top, fits true to size.
customer_reviews.text: I purchased (3) of the XL High Visibility Vests for my golden retrievers. I like that it zips on top, has great reflective awareness and fits them perfectly. Their weights range from 55-75 pounds. I highly recommend this vest for full reflective coverage. Good price too!
customer_reviews.author: Kathy

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Seems nice and durable, when it got too dirty I threw it in my washer (I didnt dry it, i just hung it up). I like the zipper over Velcro because the velcro always gets full of hair and doesn't stick. I have a long haired dog, so I just put my hand under the zipper as I do it to avoid catching her hair and that works fine.
customer_reviews.author: Heather I.

customer_reviews.title: Terrible Quality
customer_reviews.text: This will not last on a dog or in the washing machine.
customer_reviews.author: Dawn Walston

customer_reviews.title: Size and weather
customer_reviews.text: I had concerns about what size to buy, so i opted for the next size up, large would work but I went with the XL, this vest can be seen from a long distance which is what I wanted and I’m at ease now knowing she should be safe, however I believe this to be a cool weather item, just a heads up to make sure your pet doesn’t overheat
customer_reviews.author: WTHS1969

customer_reviews.title: Best all around for value, comfort & visibility!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest for it's all around value, comfort & visibility! What I would like to see is a size on the vest somewhere, anywhere? I ordered 3 of these & had to look back at the order & when they were received in order to know if the size was a large or XL? If it is there, I don't see it & all of mine didn't have a size tag on them.
customer_reviews.author: Joan D.

customer_reviews.title: Good after modifications.
customer_reviews.text: Good for the cost, but needs a lot of modifications to sit properly and to prevent your male dog from peeing into the bottom of it. It is very wide and dangly on the bottom otherwise. Sits weird around the neck as well. After the modifications it works for what I needed it for.
customer_reviews.author: nat

customer_reviews.title: Made like crap
customer_reviews.text: The zippers both broke off within the first 10 minutes they wore it. Lost them in no time. You get what you pay for and that's garbage
customer_reviews.author: amalio salerno

customer_reviews.title: Easy to put on
customer_reviews.text: For my 50# Airdale so he's seen & a little Protection underneath... could B a little on the Top & Side's (he's a Boy) Could have more styles...Heavier for protection...& One that could keep them Warmer
customer_reviews.author: Michael D Higgins

customer_reviews.title: Nice dog jacket
customer_reviews.text: Nice dog jacket. Very light for summer but I ordered a medium and was too big for my dog. It says medium fits dogs 10Ib to 80Ib. My dog weights around 15 In and it's to loose and get caught on his back short legs
customer_reviews.author: Patricia

customer_reviews.title: Good vest. Great reflective quality.
customer_reviews.text: Ran slightly big for measurements. I have a beagle mix so she was between sizes. I went larger because in past experience, her chest always is bigger than her neck and waist, so he sweaters have been tight.
customer_reviews.author: tsspotts

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT
customer_reviews.text: We love it I do believe because of the reviews we did go down one size from what the size charts says our Catahoula should be and it was a great choice it fits her great!!!!! They are VERY HIGH reflective we will be buying more for the rest of our dogs!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don’t bother with cheap bad design
customer_reviews.text: Poorly manufactured and a nightmare to get on a wiggly dog anxious to go for a walk. Zippers and dogs do not mix. You have to line up the crappy plastic zipper in order to get it to zip. My dog runs in the woods, and this thing came off the first day
customer_reviews.author: Ellen Barry

customer_reviews.title: Good little vest
customer_reviews.text: Our dog is the color of sand and dry weeds so when we go out in our desert she would disappear only a few feet from us. This vest makes her visible at even 300 feet away. In town it is a good safety feature too especially at night.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen Rae Leak

customer_reviews.title: Great reflection
customer_reviews.text: This fits our pug perfectly, size medium. He is easier to see when we walk at night and it zips easily and quickly so he can be on his way. Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Ms Patti

customer_reviews.title: Great for hunting dogs can see them at night
customer_reviews.text: My husband and I own a hunting ranch and we only use this products for our dogs when going through the brush when searching blood trails of wounded big game animals
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: good product but is too bulky
customer_reviews.text: good product but is too bulky I ordered a small for the dog according to his weight. but it hangs to low and he urinates on it -phew will have to sew some velcro straps on it to make it fit tighter . He look like a little HI way worker in it
customer_reviews.author: ray r.

customer_reviews.title: It's bright enough, and light enough for warmer weather.
customer_reviews.text: Used this safety-vest for my dog during an all-day event we were volunteering for. I wanted to make sure I could see him should he run off (which didn't turn out to be a problem). A great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Have Blue

customer_reviews.title: Good for calm dogs who can sit still while you fiddle with the zipper.
customer_reviews.text: Quite visible. If you have a wiggly dog though, it's a bit difficult to zip up the back. We use it, but the seams came loose and I've had to restitch it myself. Our dogs run through natural areas and it did take a beating.
customer_reviews.author: DogsAndCatsMom

customer_reviews.title: I like the zipper
customer_reviews.text: It passed the Rudy test--the first one lasted abut 6 hiking trips before ripping. I like the zipper, but feel it would be better starting at the head and zipping toward the backside. This way the natural pressure of the dog running and encountering wind, brush etc. would not encourage the zipper to unzip. I would also like this in blaze orange color. The 2nd vest is holding up well after 2-4 hikes.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Carey

customer_reviews.title: Just buy it!!
customer_reviews.text: I love it!! This is the first vest to actually stay on my hound who loves to run pretty continually, especially through the snow!! His nickname is Houdini Hound, since he escapes pretty much...everything. This vest kept him highly visible yet able to run freely and safely. Definite 5 star rating!!
customer_reviews.author: Pamela from Wisconsin

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight but not harness-compatible
customer_reviews.text: High visibility, easily washable but not compatible with a harness. No hole for leash hooks and zipper goes acrossed where most harness rings are located. So not for use when walking with a harness.
customer_reviews.author: AllRight

customer_reviews.title: Great for night walks
customer_reviews.text: We tested this out last night and we can definitely see our pup better at night, my only concern is the zipper does not close all the way but the vest stayed on thru all our activities.
customer_reviews.author: Melsa

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility and dogs seem comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Love these for our pups. Black and brown are hard to see at night, especially in the country with no street lights. Our pups seems comfortable in them, so we will be ordering the larger sizes when they grow. We like that the vest can be seen from any angle, unlike collars or harnesses.
customer_reviews.author: Page

customer_reviews.title: Great visibility
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my dog before we head out to walk. Very visible at night. She also wears a collar with blinky LED lights.
customer_reviews.author: John T.

customer_reviews.title: Reflective and lightweight!
customer_reviews.text: We wanted something inexpensive and lightweight for hunting season. This did the trick! We live in the country so the reflective material is a great value. I want the area hunters to be able to see her when she's running about especially at night!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 3 Boys

customer_reviews.title: Almost - exactly what we were looking for
customer_reviews.text: I love the vest over all. I like that it is light weight, very visible, easy to put on and fits true to size. There are a couple of things I wish were different though, one is the zipper going in the other direction so you are going with the direction of the way their hair grows and secondly, a snap at the end of the zipper keeping it from unzipping. I had to zip one of my dogs back up several times.
customer_reviews.author: "tellp"

customer_reviews.title: Not for fat dogs
customer_reviews.text: As far as I can tell, this is a high quality product, however, I cannot get the XL to fit around my 105 lb Dutch Shepherd. Yes, she is about 15 lbs. overweight but I can't imagine she's the largest dog out there, and I bought it so I can start running with her to help her lose weight. I'm giving it 4 stars for the limited sizing options.
customer_reviews.author: Kuan

customer_reviews.title: Fits a bit too snug on my 75lb pit mix
customer_reviews.text: I like the concept, but it doesn't fit my pit mix very well (75lbs), she has a a bigger upper body and it's little too snug. Getting it on her is a bit tricky too, but once it's on, it stays put.
customer_reviews.author: Marie D. Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: I put this on my dog all the time when she comes to work with me. Love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Denise Pfau

customer_reviews.title: Does the trick
customer_reviews.text: This is very thin, but does the trick. Medium fits my 4 month lab/dobbie mix.
customer_reviews.author: JShopper

customer_reviews.title: Excellent hi-viz, fits great, stays in place.
customer_reviews.text: This is perfect for walking in the woods in the fall and for walking at night. Fit perfectly. I do wish the zipped from the top down so it would be with the fur. It requires a bit of care to not zip fur into it but not awful.
customer_reviews.author: Annie Dee

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: We bought this so my husband can take our Frenchie to work with him in his big rig. We bought a large since our dog is right on the line between medium and large. The fit is kind of awkward, but its going to work perfect for what we need it for.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Moore

customer_reviews.title: Safety first!
customer_reviews.text: Just needed to make sure everyone knew we were together. Safety first!
customer_reviews.author: Cheryl Lieteau

customer_reviews.title: Not for short legged dogs.
customer_reviews.text: Poor fit on 2 different dogs same size. Had to do some sewing to adjust fit.Otherwise ok.
customer_reviews.author: misspenny

customer_reviews.title: Highly Visable
customer_reviews.text: My dog works nights with me, so I needed a reflective vest for him. This vest is definately visably.
customer_reviews.author: TrailRidingEMT

customer_reviews.title: Good for a short haired dog- not a fluffy one.
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice vest, but I had to return it because it didn’t work for my Sheltie with his long coat. Too hard to zip up with the fur poking through. It also looked odd with his mane and butt hair proofing out. It’s a perfectly good product for a short or flat coated pup.... just not for a poofy one.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica M

customer_reviews.title: Nice but fit very large on my dog...
customer_reviews.text: Very nice quality product but fit very large on my dog.
customer_reviews.author: Claudia Zamudio

customer_reviews.title: Good Refective Dog Vest
customer_reviews.text: This vest fit my dog well, is easy to put on, and reflects light very well. It was delivered on time and although I haven't had it very long, I can recommend it as of this time. I don't know how well it will wear but see no reason for it to have problems, based on my initial experience with it (one month).
customer_reviews.author: Arlene

customer_reviews.title: Cool light weight works great short term
customer_reviews.text: Works great for staying on dog, zip up style is a must over any Velcro vests. The material is cool, thin and light weight. Great for dog comfort but not great for long term durability. We are on vest 4 because they do not hold up long, holes tear in them easily.
customer_reviews.author: _epgifford

customer_reviews.title: It's ok for dog walkers
customer_reviews.text: It ripped the first hour of pheasant hunting. Would be ok for dog walking. But not a dog that hunts. Needs to be more heavy weight for that.
customer_reviews.author: Roger Smith

customer_reviews.title: Going to the dogs!
customer_reviews.text: Nice quality, purchased for 80-90lb dog and they were too big.... easy return, quick process and refund
customer_reviews.author: S. Sheldon-Isard

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME
customer_reviews.text: Love them for running dogs Australian Koolies/shepherd through the hard Arizona Desert
customer_reviews.author: Charles R Davis

customer_reviews.title: GREAT SAFETY VEST
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A VERY GOOD SAFETY VEST. GOTTA BE HONEST, MY DOG IS A 92LB DOG AND I GOT THE EXTRA LARGE AND HER CHEST IS HUGE SO IT IS A LITTLE TOUGH GETTING HER ZIPPED. SHE WEARS IT AND SHE LIKES IT SO I AM HAPPY TOO.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Smith

customer_reviews.title: Ordered the wrong size but if I had the right ...
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the wrong size but if I had the right size I think my dog would have ruined it since it is so thin. But I might still see if it works for him.
customer_reviews.author: stegacosa

customer_reviews.title: Really shows my shoes dog in the dark..
customer_reviews.text: I had to take this in on the sides. But I do love the reflection that it gives off.
customer_reviews.author: Cindy D

customer_reviews.title: Sizing chart off
customer_reviews.text: Liked the product but not the size chart. My baby has a 27 inch girth. Vest was still too small even though I purchased a large. I have a 50 pound pitbull.
customer_reviews.author: MarQuetta Blakey

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Perfect reflector vest for my 9 and 14lb Doxies!!! As the days shorten and dusk arrives earlier I can be confident that we can be seen by the cars in my neighborhood. This is of great importance as we have no sidewalks.
customer_reviews.author: Karen B.

customer_reviews.title: Safety Dog
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and fit. Perfect for my dog since I take him to work with me.
customer_reviews.author: JeeperOutdoors

customer_reviews.title: but like the lightweight fabric
customer_reviews.text: I measured my dog and it still was too small. I will have to send it back, but like the lightweight fabric, so I will order a larger one. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Margaret

customer_reviews.title: Great product and customer service
customer_reviews.text: Great quality reflective vest that makes my dog hard to miss. I purchased the wrong size but the seller was very helpful in rectifying the issue. If you have Greyhound, I recommend a Large or Extra Large size.
customer_reviews.author: mike39393

customer_reviews.title: No consistency.
customer_reviews.text: We ordered a second after the first was damaged. This one was way too large, and had a zipper that extends too far beyond the fabric. Apparently this brand has no consistency.
customer_reviews.author: Prof. Whitebread

customer_reviews.title: Love this vest
customer_reviews.text: Great investment. I brought this for my friends dog when we take her out at night and let her loose on the beach. The reflective pads are highly visible from over a block away.
customer_reviews.author: Pablo Guzman

customer_reviews.title: eh
customer_reviews.text: Not very small for an xs to big for my min pin evan to big on my fat cat
customer_reviews.author: Kevin raine

customer_reviews.title: I would like to modify some Velcro on the zipper to keep it from coming undone
customer_reviews.text: I've got two redbone coonhounds the large is a good size for them I like this so much I bought one for the Neighbors beagle dog in a small fit her
customer_reviews.author: Joshbroni

customer_reviews.title: Good Services
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. Good visibility at night and easy to put on. See Spot Trot Co. provided 5 star service
customer_reviews.author: J

customer_reviews.title: Needs pocket for water bottles
customer_reviews.text: There is no pocket to carry a bottle of water or a tracker for keeping track of dogs mileage..
customer_reviews.author: Micky

customer_reviews.title: Love the vest.
customer_reviews.text: The fact that it keeps my chihuahua safe is priceless.
customer_reviews.author: J Ram

customer_reviews.title: I see you
customer_reviews.text: Very visible for a dog that blends into the trees.
customer_reviews.author: Shayla Marquardson

customer_reviews.title: Just wrong size
customer_reviews.text: The size was wrong, not built well for a male dog.
customer_reviews.author: Loralyn Holt

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is big
customer_reviews.text: Measured my dog for sizing and it is way too big by almost double. I like the product but being so big he pees on it out on our evening walk. So every night it gets washed.
customer_reviews.author: Dave S

customer_reviews.title: SIZE CHART WRONG
customer_reviews.text: Beware, the size Harris total off, item was too small!
customer_reviews.author: Bryan L.

customer_reviews.title: It’s fast is too cute
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my neighbors dog down the street because She wears a pink safety vest when she walks early in the morning I thought it would be a cute thing if they matched
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: Great fit
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Border Collie for a fall camping/hiking trip and I'm very pleased. Shes about 35 lbs but I ordered a large because of her long hair and big chest. Fits her very well, not too tight or loose and doesn't bother her at all
customer_reviews.author: jack anthony spadaro

customer_reviews.title: A must for night time walks!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality, easy to put on and wide enough around the shoulders that the material doesn't inhibit movement. Highly reflective.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Maglio

customer_reviews.title: Seems good
customer_reviews.text: the XL is a bit snug on my 80 pound Lab but it will work. Wish they made larger ones for my 120lb mega-mutt though.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: Good sizing
customer_reviews.text: Vest was good size and fit my 55lb wirehair perfectly. Unfortunately my dog ran through a barbed wire fence the first time out and tore up the vest...
customer_reviews.author: Garrett

customer_reviews.title: It does run a bit big. We have a ...
customer_reviews.text: It does run a bit big. We have a 42lb Dalmatian and ordered a Medium and it is a bit big. I will keep it in hopes that she will eventually grow into it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelli Meehling

customer_reviews.title: very happy
customer_reviews.text: Thank you for giving me the full refund on the one I sent back that was 2 big, second one fit purfect
customer_reviews.author: Darcy Slack

customer_reviews.title: My baby visibility
customer_reviews.text: I love watching my boy running in the park, and been able to see him from long distance is priceless
customer_reviews.author: sandra

customer_reviews.title: X-L
customer_reviews.text: Got X-L for my Great Danes and it fits them both. A little bit tight for the older but not so much 😊
customer_reviews.author: Birna Kristï¿½n ï¿½marsdï¿½ttir

customer_reviews.title: Week stitching
customer_reviews.text: Well I’m a Tow Truck driver and my copilot is with me 14 hours a day most days 2 weeks and stitches are breaking loose around armpit.
customer_reviews.author: BearsBeard

customer_reviews.title: Durable but some aspects could be improved
customer_reviews.text: My dog is no longer camouflaged with the autumn leaves but it would be better with a bit of stretch especially since she has a larger chest compared to all other parts of her.
customer_reviews.author: Megan McClure

customer_reviews.title: Just as the seller described
customer_reviews.text: It fit my dog great, I also think the quality and price is excellent!
customer_reviews.author: Dave Conrads

customer_reviews.title: Wrong fit
customer_reviews.text: The size I ordered ended up being too big. Unfortunately it is too loose in the chest, so when my dog lifts his leg to pee he also gets the vest. I'll have to alter it somehow. My dog is a small (20 lb) cocker spaniel.
customer_reviews.author: Jenny

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: I have a dog that likes wander around my acreage and this helps me find her fast. The reflective sides are large enough that the flashlight picks her up quickly. And since she is a Weimaraner she doesn't get taken for a deer.
customer_reviews.author: D BARRY NOTTAGE

product_meta.title: See Spot Trot - See Spot Zip EV Sport High Visibility Reflective Dog Safety Vest, Ideal to Keep Dogs Safe While Walking or Hunting.
feature_bullets: SIZING - See our sizing chart for the perfect fit!
Snag Free Zipper - Our See Spot Zip vests are constructed with a large tooth zipper that is easy to zip and unzip without snags.

Stay Visible Day Or Night - Our See Spot Zip EV Sport Vests keep dogs safe, on or off leash! It’s designed for maximum visibility, day or night. Great for dog walking, dog hunting excursions, and just about any other type of outdoor adventure. Body form fit allows you to use your favorite harness or collar with this vest.
NO RISK GUARANTEE! – If you don’t LOVE your new See Spot Trot safety vest, send it back for a full refund, no questions asked!

Stand Out From The Crowd- Great for exercise time or a jog through the park. There are limited styles of dog jacket accessories and dog clothes out there so stand out from the crowd with our new See Spot Trot line of reflective gear!
